mapper.sql: tb.id AS id, DATE_FORMAT(tb.operate_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS operateTime, tb.whether_success AS whetherSuccess, tb.logistics_id AS logisticsId, tl.code as logisticsCode, tb.platform_account AS platformAccount, tb.customer_info AS customerInfo, tb.search_way AS searchWay, tb.order_amount AS orderAmount, tb.comment_content AS commentContent, tb.comment_picture_one AS commentPictureOne, tb.comment_picture_two AS commentPictureTwo, tb.comment_picture_three AS commentPictureThree
mapper.select:
select
from tbl_brush tb LEFT JOIN tbl_logistics tl ON tb.logistics_id = tl.id where 1=1
AND tb.customer_info LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') OR tl.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and (tb.operate_time between CONCAT(#{beginTime},' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(#{endTime},' 23:59:59'))
